summaries.short: Season Two Premiere. Sofia is in control of SofiX but struggles to keep her career and love life a secret.
summaries.full: Season Two Premiere. Sofia is in control of SofiX but struggles to keep her career and love life a secret. To make matters worse, her mother believes she is neglecting her children and her lover Marcello is afraid she is embarrassed of him. As tensions rise, Sofia comes up with an outrageous idea.

summaries.short: Sofia helps Marcello with his acting career, but he still doubts her commitment to their relationship.
summaries.full: Sofia tries to improve the customer experience at SofiX while her family begins to resent her for spending so much time at work. Marcello meets Cacá and looks to kickstart his career as a theater actor.

summaries.short: Season finale. Violeta finds out about the secrets her mother has been hiding. Sofia tries to move on from Marcello.
summaries.full: Season finale. Violeta finds out about the secrets her mother has been hiding. Sofia tries to move on from Marcello and starts dating again. Lucia sends more clients to SofiX but things quickly get out of hand.

summaries.short: Sofia's business idea pays off, but she receives bad news about both SofiX and her son.
summaries.full: Sofia's plan to provide custom experiences at SofiX starts to pay off but she is blindsided by worrisome financial news. Marcello gets a surprise at rehearsal and Julio is arrested while attending a protest.

summaries.short: Lucia pitches an interesting business idea that may be able to save SofiX.
summaries.full: After sleeping with Marcello, Sofia wonders whether she can have a relationship with a porn star. Pierre and Igor continue to fight over the direction of the movie. Lucia pitches an interesting business idea that may be able to save SofiX.

summaries.short: Things seem to improve for Sofia once Marcello meets her family, but a secret threatens their relationship.
summaries.full: Sofia sorts out the company's finances and introduces Marcello to her family. During a rehearsal, Marcello's partner quits, and Sofia discovers a version of the play she was not prepared to see.

summaries.short: A quick look at Sn 1 / Ep 6 of the series 'Hard.'
summaries.full: A quick look at Sn 1 / Ep 6 of the series 'Hard.'

summaries.short: Sofia invites a theater director to the studio to help improve the staff’s acting abilities. Marcello asks Sofia out on a date.
summaries.full: Sofia invites a theater director to the studio to help improve the staff’s acting abilities. Marcello asks Sofia out on a date. Lucia reveals her sex fantasy.

summaries.short: A quick look at Sn 1 / Ep 5 of the series 'Hard.'
summaries.full: A quick look at Sn 1 / Ep 5 of the series 'Hard.'
